name: Aeon Drive (demo v0.4)
description:
Aeon Drive is a fast paced high action danmaku styled shoot 'em up, or SHMUP for short. Dodge intense walls of bullets while destroying hordes of enemies and earn a high score.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

C - Shoot

V - Bomb

Z - Focus Mode | Confirm

Activate AEON DRIVE mode by filling your AEON gauge! Once full enter FOCUS MODE to fire your AEON CANNON! You must stay in FOCUS MODE to keep the AEON CANNON active, leaving FOCUS MODE will instantly deactivate your AEON DRIVE gauge and you will have to refill it if you wish to use your AEON CANNON again.

Note: The button mapping isn't perfect right now, however there is full controller support currently and you have the option to remap the buttons in the main menu. The final product will have a more intuitive default button layout.
